4300530.name: Simu V3
4300530.description:
Step into the most brutal touring cars in Argentine motorsport and experience what it truly means to race on the edge. Massive power, unforgiving tracks, and zero room for mistakes. Every corner demands precision. Every braking zone punishes hesitation.

ACTC Racing Simu V3 delivers a raw and authentic racing experience built for drivers who want realism, not shortcuts. No artificial assists. No arcade physics. Victory comes from skill, setup knowledge, and control under pressure.

From the pit lane to the checkered flag, every detail is designed to make you feel the intensity of real competition.

Key Features
High-powered touring cars with realistic handling and weight transfer.

Advanced Physics Simulation
Tire grip, suspension behavior, aerodynamics, and braking modeled for hardcore realism.

Dynamic Damage & Wear System
Mechanical wear, tire degradation, and damage that directly affect performance.

Realistic Engine & Track Sounds
Raw V8 audio captured to deliver an aggressive and immersive soundscape.

Detailed Car Setup & Tuning
Adjust suspension, gearing, aerodynamics, and balance like a real race engineer.

Challenging AI Opponents
Competitive rivals that punish mistakes and force clean, disciplined driving.

Iconic Racing Circuits
Tracks inspired by the legendary venues of Argentine motorsport.

This is not about memorizing lines.
It’s about controlling chaos at full speed.

A wealth of Argentine motorsport content, from its most historic seasons to the present day, all in one simulator. Dozens of tracks and optional extras. A simulator based on the classic gMotor 2.0 technology. A must-have for your collection!

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
